theme: The importance of understanding one's duty and the nature of reality.

sanskrit: O son of Kunti, the nonpermanent appearance of happiness and distress, and their disappearance in due course, are like the appearance and disappearance of winter and summer seasons.
transliteration: O son of Kunti, the nonpermanent appearance of happiness and distress, and their disappearance in due course, are like the appearance and disappearance of winter and summer seasons.
english: O son of Kunti, the nonpermanent appearance of happiness and distress...
hindi: हे कुंती के पुत्र, सुख-दुख का अस्थायी होना...

english: You have the right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.
hindi: आपको अपने कर्म करने का अधिकार है, लेकिन इसके फलों का अधिकार नहीं है।
समानता को योग कहा जाता है।

sanskrit: O Arjuna, the person who is not disturbed by the dualities of happiness and distress, and is unbothered by the dualities of the world, is certainly fit for liberation.
transliteration: O Arjuna, the person who is not disturbed by the dualities of happiness and distress...
english: O Arjuna, the person who is not disturbed by the dualities...
hindi: हे अर्जुन, जो सुख-दुख के द्वंद्वों से अज्ञात है...

english: While contemplating the objects of the senses, a person develops attachment for them.
hindi: जब व्यक्ति इन्द्रियों के विषयों पर ध्यान करता है...
संयोग से इच्छा उत्पन्न होती है।

sanskrit: A person who is not disturbed by the incessant flow of desires—that enter like rivers into the ocean, which is ever being filled but is always still—can alone achieve peace, and not the person who strives to satisfy such desires.
transliteration: A person who is not disturbed by the incessant flow of desires...
english: A person who is not disturbed by the incessant flow...
hindi: जो व्यक्ति इच्छाओं की निरंतर धारा से प्रभावित नहीं होता...

sanskrit: One must elevate, not degrade, oneself.
transliteration: One must elevate, not degrade, oneself.
english: One must elevate, not degrade, oneself.
hindi: एक को अपने आप को ऊँचा उठाना चाहिए, न कि गिराना।

english: He who is temperate in his habits of eating, sleeping, working, and recreation can mitigate all material pains by practicing the yoga.
hindi: जो व्यक्ति खाने, सोने, काम करने और आराम करने में संतुलित है...
